NewÔÉÅ

Creates a new index given the provided index schema.

PUT: /index/new

Parameters:

  • body [object] - Specification for creating a new index.

    e.g.:

    {
  "index": "names",
  "settings": {
  "index": {
    "number_of_shards": 1,
    "number_of_replicas": 1
  }
},
  "mappings": {
    "properties": {
      "first": {
        "type": "text"
      },
      "last": {
        "type": "text"
      }
    }
  }
}
